name: exquisiteness
content:
exquisiteness noun [U]
(BEAUTY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being very beautiful and delicate: She commented on the exquisiteness of the workmanship. I admired the exquisiteness of the orchid's bloom.
More examplesFewer examplesOne has to acknowledge the exquisiteness of this photograph.The exhibition has been organized to highlight the exquisiteness of Persian rugs. The exquisiteness of the building’s architecture and ornamentation enhances its magnificence.
